website_summaries.verdict: These heavy-duty half sheet pans evenly bake your cookies and effortlessly release them afterward.
pros: Corrugated surface facilitates air circulation for a quick release and even baking
Non-stick silicone  coating is free of PTFE, PFOA, and BPA
Heavy-duty and able to release baked goods well

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy those, we have used them for only a few month now and the coating on both pans is coming off!!!! Not a good or safe product for the money you spend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Bad coating
customer_reviews.text: Coating began flaking off after 3 uses. Lasted less than 2 months. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H-Town

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both these USA Pans and Nordicware pans at the same time and used them both to make gingerbread cookies. As you can see, the USA Pan (right) made smooth cookies that came off the sheet without a spatula and left no part of the cookie behind. The Nordicware pan cookies were cracked and I needed a spatula which still left part of the cookie behind. Both are new, so I can't speak to the wear, but these pans were nonstick and a breeze to clean.
customer_reviews.author: smt716

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy quality - how to avoid warping
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality nice thick material. I have had them before and just ordered new ones (the 2 half size pack). I notice that people have mentioned warping; if you soak these in water it can get in the seam (rim) as it is 2 thins sheets of metal stuck together. If you clean them without allowing water to get inside the sheets they don't usually warp. Also if you don't put foil on them when cooking items with oil the tins will stain after a while however I don't always use it as I like the way the tray gets nice and hot and this helps brown my vegetables. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: MTM

customer_reviews.title: Expensive yet flawed
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a baking sheet that would not warp. I liked the idea of a made in the US brand, and that it was supposed to be heavy duty. Well, these are indeed very heavy. For the price, I did not expect one of them to arrive with what appears to be a factory flaw - a bow at one end. There was no dent on the back side so it doesn't appear to be damage from shipping. I imagine it should function just fine, but I haven't tried it yet and will update my review if there are additional issues.
customer_reviews.author: DLK

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviews say this thing warps
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some nice NEW pans to replace old ones that were fine but stained up and NOT so pretty. Vain maybe but anyway, I ordered for a gift to myself after Christmas. I just used the large one today for the first time and it is a warped up piece of ........... I could not believe this heavy made pan warped like a piece of tin foil. DO NOT BUY, heed the reviews as I did NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy T.

customer_reviews.title: Warped on first use!
customer_reviews.text: I have several USA Bakeware pans and have loved them all, until now. One of these sheet pans warped the very first time it was used in a 350* oven. Some people mentioned water as a culprit, but these had been washed and put away for weeks before use, so water clearly wasn't an issue. I am very disappointed, especially considering the price of these pans. I am returning them and going back to my Nordic half-sheets, which haven't failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Made in America!
customer_reviews.text: I love these baking sheets! Plus, they are made in America, which is important, as I always try to buy American when possible. They are big and study, but they fit into my sheet pain closet just fine. I have found that they cook evenly, and clean up is a breeze. I would definitely order these again and encourage others to do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H.

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY Impressed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: at 65, I have had my share of cookie sheets. These are the best I've EVER experienced. They are sturdy, EASY to clean and still look brand new after months of use. Excellent for roasting vegetables and proteins as well as cookies for the grand kids (and Grand Pa!) I am confident I will never have to buy another even if I live til 150! Plan to give as gifts to wow those I love. PERFECT wedding gift! Wish I found them much younger, PLUS THEY ARE MADE IN THE USA! 10 STARS FOR THAT!
customer_reviews.author: Granny Annie

customer_reviews.title: One Word : Quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and made in the USA! I have purchased several sizes of this company's pans and like all of them. I have found, however, that in order to keep them looking new, it is best to use a solid oil, like coconut oil, over the entire inside surface of the pans before use. I always coat not only the inside bottom of the pans but also the sides and the rim of the pans. In addition, I also use parchment paper during all cooks. This may be overkill but it has kept the pans looking good. Just something you may want to consider doing.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Ruined the First Time I Used It
customer_reviews.text: This pan 1. immediately got food stuck to it 2. rusted. It also weighs a ton. If someone understands how to use this pan without immediately destroying it, please let me know because it doesn't seem to be made for baking items in the oven or being place in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Soukiloo

customer_reviews.title: Great for roasting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pan for roasting vegetables at a high temp. It claims it won't warp, and that's what I was looking for. So far, it hasn't warped. It is easy to wash (should not be put in the dishwasher), so I don't even use foil on the pan. I have a quarter-sheet pan from the same company that doesn't have the metal down the middle to keep it from warping, but haven't had any problems with it warping either. The smaller pan is the reason I decided to get a larger one. Plus, made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Pan will last for generations
customer_reviews.text: This pan is fabulous. My baked goods are evenly baked. No hot spots on the pan. It is easy to clean and very sturdy. The only drawback is that it is quite heavy compared to cheap pans you buy in Walmart and other discount stores, but it would not bother me at all if I didn't have arthritis in my hands. It is not so heavy as to be a problem, but it is a consideration if you are disabled, so I thought I would mention it. I believe this pan will be going strong when my grandchildren have homes of their own and end up with the pan. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: It warped
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time today and it warped as soon as it went into a preheated 400° oven. They are very heavy, which I like, but I was expecting better.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but Warped on first use.
customer_reviews.text: It warped the first time I used it at 375o for 30 minutes in order to cook bacon. Luckily it happened early in the cooking cycle so it didn't splash bacon grease everywhere, but it's very disappointing. My 1/4 sheet from USA Pan is great, but this isn't. I'm seriously considering returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Clara E. Leet

customer_reviews.title: best cookie pan ever--wish I had 5 of these
customer_reviews.text: This pan was recommended by one of my blog favorites, and it is heavy and never warps and distributes heat so evenly , and cookies bake the same. I am a baker, especially at the holidays, and this is my favorite cookie pan of all time. I have paid more for cookie sheets and less, but these are worth every penny. Each cookie browns the very same, and it lasts and lasts because of the heavy weight and construction. I have asked for an additional one of these for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: bp

customer_reviews.title: Best pan I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these pans for 8 months. I LOVE them...best pan I've ever owned and I'm 64, so have owned many. I bake cookies a lot and they come out perfect. The rippled bottom helps everything cook evenly and makes the pan very rigid and strong. It never warps during even high heat cooking. I also do many veggie bakes or bacon at 400 degrees. It has not discolored (darkened) as so many past pans have! It also washes nicely. These pans look brand new after 8 months. That's why I ordered more for a Christmas gift for my daughter in law. She will love them too! I'll never buy any other pan!
customer_reviews.author: Mary T. H.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and nonstick! Top quality pans!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Good Cook 3-pan set for baking and broiling. I never realized how flimsy and cheesy they were! But OMG I’m so impressed with the heaviness and great quality of these pans! I washed them in warm soapy water and dried them in a warm oven (my nonstick bakeware that is labeled dishwasher safe has rusted, so I dry in the oven to prevent rusting). I then baked chocolate chip cookies on them and these pans are amazing. No warping (which my other pans always did but it never bothered me) and they are HEAVY just solid and good quality. I’m looking forward to using these pans for all of my future baking needs! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: James Brown

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality USA-Made Bakeware Pan
customer_reviews.text: I really like that this product is made in the USA; Very sturdy; extremely easy to hand wash/clean with soapy regular wet sponge in sink* (* dishwasher not recommended, but harsh chemicals of dishwashing soap would harm product, not efficiently remove grease and warp pan anyway! ). Longevity and pan quality increased with using parchment paper or Silpat French Professional liner depending on various chosen pan baking uses ( roasting veggies, baking biscuits, cookies, scones, etc.) High Recommendation; have purchased this pan in various sizes; and this Specific American-Made Bakeware/Cookware Brand for: muffin pans, cupcake pans, bread loaf pans, meatloaf pans, baking cooling racks...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived scratched
customer_reviews.text: This is the second order of this item. This order is a replacement for first order that was returned due to arriving with scratches. Two orders/two pans: both arrived scratched. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: Junk  - Disappointed in this made in USA product
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted nonstick finish is peeling off. I have used this pan 3 times all at temperature from 375 to 400 deg f. Too late to return so my loss and it is tossed. Really too bad, it is well built except for the nonstick finish, maybe I just got a bad one but if that is the case then the factory quality control is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Elizondo Mountain Dew Herbert Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality bakeware I’ve ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Love USA Brand bakeware... This is the highest quality, heavy duty, and fabulous bakeware you will ever find. I have many different sheets and pans from this collection, and like them so much I bought sets for my adult kids because everyone should have such quality bakeware. I could definitely sell these for a living with sincere enthusiasm. Buy these, and then get all the others sizes and styles.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Flyer

customer_reviews.title: like all pans of this type we try
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this due to the mostly positive reviews. However, the pan warped with the very first use at 425 degrees. When it cools, it 'almost' returns to flat, but it is still warped. During cooking however, it is visibly warped while in the oven causing grease/oil to pool in one corner. It does cook even and it's heavy construction does lead you to believe it's a quality product. But, like all pans of this type we try, it too has warped. I must say that we still use it and the warp has not gotten any worse. My wife likes it despite the warp as it is the 'best' warped pan we have. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerBorn

customer_reviews.title: Great pan, but one arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans and would normally give 5 stars but one of the pans arrived dented. The damage won't affect baking so I won't go to the trouble of returning or waiting for a replacement. Aside from that, my baked goods turn out beautifully every time using these pans. Never have to use parchment paper and they are extremely easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Warping despite following instructions.....grrrrrr!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed! I purchased these in 2017 and have taken good care of them. I always let them cool on their own after removing them from the oven - I never soak them or put cold water on them while they're warm. Yet, they are still very warped. I purchased these because I'd expected that paying a little more for pans like this would ensure they're better quality. They are not! I'll stick to the cheaper pans in the future. If they're going to warp anyway there's not point in paying so much for them as I did with this unfortunate purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great pans!!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great. Nothing sticks to them, easy to clean with soap and water. I always use parchment or oil, not spray type oils purchased in cans. Those build up and get sticky. I use my own oil in a spray bottle, but mostly must parchment. Great pans made in the USA!!
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Commercial kitchen quality for the home!
customer_reviews.text: My wife asked for new baking pans for Christmas and I only know what I learned working in commercial kitchens - so I ordered these and hoped for the best! I was impressed straight away by their weight and even cooking properties - if you've worked in commercial kitchens and want that same performance in your home kitchen, these are a great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Ewing D. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to do sheet-pan suppers and I am very very happy with it. As I have used it I have struggled with some baked on stains but in general it has been a wonderful pan. It heats evenly and food releases well from it - I use it at least 5 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Aven

customer_reviews.title: Wham! Bam! I love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pan for making oven fries, cooking pizza (yes a stone block might be better but I'm not Martha Stewart!), roasting veg, etc. It's so nice. Nothing has ever stuck to it, and it's easy to clean. Things cook very evenly. I haven't tried out the silicone mat yet, but if it's anything like the pan I know I'm in for a thrill.
customer_reviews.author: Weasel

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about my USA Pan Bakeware.......beginning with it's name "USA" Pan. It looks strong, durable and easy to use. Just received today and used once....LOVE, LOVE, LOVE.....can't wait to buy more of these products for myself and buy as gifts for my family members. So excited to get more and fill my kitchen with more "USA" items! :-) :-)
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: NOT Warp Resistant
customer_reviews.text: The title says warp resistant, I placed in the oven on 350 degrees and within 5 minutes it had "popped" and was warped. Very disappointed with that. It was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: mchmlp

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Who knew that a "half sheet pan" is what most of us would consider a full sheet? I guess they use enormous full sheets in bakeries. I wanted something about half the size of what I currently use (which is this size). It's just hubby and me and I don't need a pan this large most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: wonder time

customer_reviews.title: It warped at 425 by the third use!!!
customer_reviews.text: It says good up to 425... well, the third time I used it (never going over 425) I had bacon in it at 425 and the darn thing warped on me! And fast too! I’m just irritated that NO ONE in this industry offers TRULY sturdy, non-warping sheet pans. I thought I’d fibally found a pan & company that could offer quality, sadly I’m mistaken, again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid steel, amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: These things will stop a bullet. They're a little expensive, but so much higher quality than the imported junk I used to buy, which got replaced every year or two. These are machine washable, but make sure to check your dishwasher's dimensions, because even the half sheet pans are a little too big to fit in mine. Still, a small price to pay for how good these are.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: No warping!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I've had this pan a few weeks, and have used it to bake cookies and roast potatoes. It is very sturdy and, unlike my Calphalon pan that this one is replacing, it shows no signs of warping in the oven. I've also been impressed with how easily it cleans up. Glad I gave this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stand up over time
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had and used two of these pans for just more than a year. At first, they were fantastic but are barely nonstick now. Having used parchment for years, I was hoping for a more sustainable option but now I find myself going back to parchment. For the price, I feel like they should’ve held up to useage longer. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for a couple of months now and absolutely love them! The silicone mats are easy to wash and unless something I bake touches the metal pan I just wipe them down and put them away. They've not warped at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pan, but ours has a defect
customer_reviews.text: This pan is exactly as advertised, except for it has a defect on the surface. At first I thought it was adhesive from the label/sticker that was applied directly to the pan. I have washed and scrubbed the pan only to find this defect is permanent. I hope the seller sees this comment and is willing to provide an adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Reichen1981

customer_reviews.title: Best pans ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pan you’ll ever buy, literally the heaviest, non warping bakeware and excellent non-stick silicone coating - too awesome, just buy them. I plan on replacing each and every baking item I have with everything from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Kirbach

customer_reviews.title: Well-made with a great nonstick surface
customer_reviews.text: These pans are very well made and seem very durable. They seem to conduct heat very evenly which is very important, but they also have an amazing nonstick surface that makes it a breeze to clean them. I was very impressed and I think they are well worth the money even if you only occasionally bake, because they will last a very long time and they aren't that expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Best pans.
customer_reviews.text: No need for foil or parchment paper - things do not stick to these pans. They are not recommended for very high heat (over 450 I think) or they will darken but I have not found any better, or even as good. Buy them, you are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vic in NWW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent HEAVY weight pans
customer_reviews.text: don't be surprised at the size of these pans. by definition a "whole sheet" in baking terms equals 2 of these side by side, which would not fit in a standard residential oven. these are definitely quality commercial baking pans.
customer_reviews.author: sunfun

customer_reviews.title: Bought again
customer_reviews.text: we bake a lot. This is the best pan we have ever used in US. Others get rusty or burned quickly. This is strong, heavy and sturdy. We use it with baking sheets so I am not sure about the stickiness but feels like wonderful nonstick.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this!! So sick of buying sheets that buckle in the oven... not this heavy duty one!! Just received and put it through a few different tests... all with an excellent outcome!! Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, non-stick and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: The BEST baking sheets EVER. Non-stick for real LOVE them for roasting veg. They do have a texture on the bottom, so if you are baking keep that in mind, the bottom of your baked goods will have the texture too!
customer_reviews.author: jrm37'fugitive

customer_reviews.title: best ever!
customer_reviews.text: everything I've cooked using this is perfect. Cookies don't burn or stick, no parchment paper necessary. I slathered BBQ sauce on precooked ribs and baked them at 350 for 20 minutes. The pan was blackened, but cleaned easily with just soap and a dishcloth. I have purchased quite a few for friends and family, everyone raves about them.
customer_reviews.author: Nani

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pans on the market. Heavy duty and clean up easily. Made in the USA, too. We own 2 ourselves and have bought them for gifts for cooks we know.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi F.

customer_reviews.title: Warped on first use
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this pan. When it arrived, I was delighted by the heavy, solid feel of it. The surface feels like nothing would stick. I was certain that this would be the one sheet pan that would not warp. I was disappointed on the first use. The first time I used this pan was to roast a piece of fish. After just a few minutes in a 400 degree oven, the pan popped out of shape. I'm giving it 3 stars because the fish didn't stick, the skin crisped nicely, and clean up was easy. Otherwise, I would give it a lower rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It warped
customer_reviews.text: It warped at 425 degrees, about a half inch on diagonal corners.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L. GardnerTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost. Will last forever
customer_reviews.text: These pans are more than worth the money. I have several of these pans and one of them made it through a self clean cycle in our oven all it did was darken in color, the other pan that was in the oven warped and was unusable(not a USA pan).
customer_reviews.author: Josh Brockman

customer_reviews.title: Does not wear well
customer_reviews.text: I loved this sheet pan initially. But the coating is coming off now so very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Superior product! Thank you Bundy family!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cookie sheet ever! A little heavy, but that to me adds to the durability of the product! Watch you cook times with the sheets because they are that efficient at heat transfer.
customer_reviews.author: MQS

customer_reviews.title: Proper equipment makes all the difference
customer_reviews.text: Best baking pans I've ever used. If you're struggling with old, warped, rusty, thin baking pans do yourself a favor and get these. They were recommended by a baking blog and I took a chance. Glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: OMG. Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Obsessed. I was desperate over our current pan situation and for our wedding I found these and added them to our registry. Basically they are the best thing, ever. Given I’m coming from pans that warped, stained and we’re brutal to clean. These are totally worth the money, and I may adjust this in a year to update. But for the moment I just roasted a bunch of veggies and they are perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Paige S.

customer_reviews.title: Black spots
customer_reviews.text: I liked the weight but got disappointed with the wuarter pan when i got all these nlack spots on them i washed by hand so i am not surecwhst this is i thought this would be a long lasting pan i find made in USA DOESNT mean quality very didappointing
customer_reviews.author: Msb

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good with these pans, but I had to google how to clean the silicone liner. We always bake our bacon and it worked great with the silicone liner, but getting the liner clean is a hassle. Other than that a good pan overall.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy but good.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great for baking chicken, potatoes, cookies, all kinds of stuff. The band around the pan stays hot for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheet Pan
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sheet pan I have ever owned. It doesn't warp or stain much. I have noticed a few light stains after the 3rd time I grilled veggies, especially tomatoes. I was afraid to scrub too hard, as not to damage the nonstick coating, but not a big issue. Still looks new after 2 months. Throwing everything else out and replacing them with more USA Pans.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Best pans period
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sheet pans I have ever used. Hands, down. Having said that, the aluminum coating is thin an will corrode is soaked in water too long. Same story if you cut with a metal knife. I bought one to start with and just bought three more sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Craig V

customer_reviews.title: The best cookie sheets ever!
customer_reviews.text: These cookie sheets are the best! Stop buying cheap ones that burn your cookies. These are so much better! Cookies bake more evenly and clean up is a breeze. I first purchased them from the King Arthur Flour website which is a guarantee of quality. They are a little less expensive here without the KAF label but the quality is the same. I replaced all my old cookie sheets with these and you should too.
customer_reviews.author: derolfe

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this pan is awesome! My husband likes his pork chopa burnt... weird, yes... but, I just cooked pork chops at 425 for an hour and it never buckled. Also, they never burnt to the pan, just slid right off, breading still in tact. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sherryapm

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars. Sturdy pan.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the price. I thought this probably won’t last long. Wrong! It cleans 🧽 so easy too! So happy with this purchase! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best non-stick pans I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of pans! They are so sturdy and nothing sticks to them. I have 2 flat pans, 2 round cake pans and a muffin tin. They work great! I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Draper

customer_reviews.title: Throw out your old pans
customer_reviews.text: These are the best pans I have ever had. They conduct heat very evenly. The pans are commercial grade and clean up is a breeze. Crispy pan pizza, no problem. Oven fried fish, delicious. Cookies perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: These are the BOM!
customer_reviews.text: Just stop buying cheap bakeware right now and buy these. If I had the money I've spent over the years on low-grade metal baking pans that twist at 350 degrees I would be able to have a kitchen full of the right cooking and baking items. These are fantastic. Throw away the old and make room for this!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jarrells

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with quality! After a few months things stick
customer_reviews.text: These pans didn’t last very long. Things started sticking after a few months. Don’t seem to be any better than the cheapest pans you can buy! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: rknick

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Have had a smaller size for years but needed a larger size to really spread out a package of bacon. Same brtand as the one I have used for twenty year. Built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ashe

customer_reviews.title: All are the best pans I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Bought several pans made by this company. All are the best pans I've ever had. Have meatloaf pan, 2 pizza pans, 3 bread pans and this sheet pan. Wash them by hand with a little sudsy warm water and you're done. Nothing sticks to them. No need to use spray nonstick oil. For pizza pans be sure you buy a plastic pizza wheel so you don't wreck the finish. I bought the OXO Good Grips and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: No other baking pans needed ever again. USA all the way!
customer_reviews.text: By far the absolute best pans ever made. Will never use any of the rest.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PANS!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE these pans! I bought two loaf pans first and my bread came out perfectly browned on the sides and bottom - subsequently, the sheet pans did not disappoint. Sturdy AND made in the USA. Buy these pans!!
customer_reviews.author: DebDeb

customer_reviews.title: Best sheet
customer_reviews.text: Never in many years have I found a pan with best nonstick finish. This is great
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G

customer_reviews.title: No more burnt bottoms
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pan that isn't so thin that it burns the bottom of what I'm baking. The heat distribution is perfect and the nonstick surface makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: kim labarre

customer_reviews.title: Warps In Oven
customer_reviews.text: Warps considerably when I put in oven(350-400). Just a little warped when it cools off. Is non stick and cleans up well. Bummer it bends like beckham.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warped pan
customer_reviews.text: This pan warped on my first use with it. Pretty upset as i was only cooking food at 400 degrees
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey N.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these pans!!
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased one of these pans at Bed Bath and Beyond but was told they weren't going to carry them anymore. So, I rushed home after finding out I LOVED them and purchased 3 more in different sizes from Amazon. I love how well they are constructed, the healthy non-stick surface, the easy cleanup. These are the best baking pans I have ever purchased and I have purchased many well named brands to ultimately be disappointed. I look forward to purchasing other sizes and varieties to add to my collection. I highly recommend these if you want a well made baking pan that virtually releases food each and every time and will last for years!
customer_reviews.author: Heavncentt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with this pan. It warped at 325 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: M Meyer

customer_reviews.title: This is baking sheet you’ve been searching for.
customer_reviews.text: I went through purchasing so many baking sheets until I found this one. All the others would warp or rust instantly. We’ve had this one for a while and it’s extremely heavy duty that does its job perfectly. It’s never wrapped or rusted. This is definitely a high quality baking sheet and I can’t find anything better to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley D.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I first wrote that this pan “flexed” in the oven BUT after the first time in the oven it STOPPED flexing so this along with the non-stick makes this a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are Fantastic! Non-stick, easy to clean and they they do not warp! I have several other USA pans and they are all worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: steve d

customer_reviews.title: I figured this is a good balance between full aluminum pan and steel pan
customer_reviews.text: I baked some cookies on this pan the other day and got rave reviews. I figured this is a good balance between full aluminum pan and steel pan. The main gripe I have with steel is poor heat conductivity. Highly recommend it. You can tell it's made out of good material and will last. Stop buying the whatever pans at TJ Maxx. This pan is so durable it could double as a weapon. Thank you and good night.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Y

customer_reviews.title: USA Pans Are Best Oven Roasters
customer_reviews.text: Good hefty pan. One cannot buy a better pan than the USA ones. I have one of almost every size and form of the ones from this manufacturer, but I have only one of this particular pan. I will be ordering another one of these 13 x 18 inch ones and donate my older, non-USA pans. USA pans do not buckle in the oven at high heat.
customer_reviews.author: Laralea, Birmingham

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and don't warp.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy pans! No warping! Easy to clean and stay nice.looking. I wish I'd replace my old pants with these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: V. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: I love the ridges
customer_reviews.text: After 75 min. in the oven, drying the tomatoes, the juices had burned and they WASHED RIGHT OFF! The heat is even. The silat mat is great, too.
customer_reviews.author: Vin's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy weight. Love them! I'm not worried about these warping anytime soon and I use them a minimum of once a week.
customer_reviews.author: cassie

customer_reviews.title: USA Pan Bakeware Half Sheet Pan, Warp Resistant Nonstick Baking Pan
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty and I know I'll have this pan for a long time. Great quality and love that it's made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: ksummerfield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is amazing. I always thought that I was a bad baker when it came to cookies. It was the pan! This pan makes thick delicious cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Anli

customer_reviews.title: do you have anything heavier?
customer_reviews.text: i am sad i threw my pan away i got 30 years ago. these pans do warp. they are heavy, sturdy and well made but i cook nearly every day. pizza, chicken, fries in the oven..at 450 for 60 minutes....they warp.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B

customer_reviews.title: It warped on first use
customer_reviews.text: It warped on first use. The instruction says not to exceed 450F, but mine warped at 425F.
customer_reviews.author: Coco M.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Baking Pan
customer_reviews.text: I love my baking pan. I always used to use a cookie sheet, and I never realized what I was missing. It cooks evenly and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CindyRam19

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through many sheet pans, and these are by far the best quality. They are a bit more expensive to buy, but they are worth the cost. They are heavier weight and bake evenly. I will never buy another brand of pan again. Although, based on the quality of these, I doubt I will need to replace them for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: SM3

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Sheet Pan
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this because she wanted a nicer quality sheet pan and she is really pleased with it. Yes, it stays flat and food doesn't stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Vet

customer_reviews.title: great american quality !
customer_reviews.text: this is a quality ,well made baking pan,very solid,ordered and delivered in 1 day,very pleased !!!
customer_reviews.author: william h.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are great pans. They cook evenly, clean easily, and are nice and durable. The coatings seem durable as well. I recommend these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty....
customer_reviews.text: Very solid tray that won’t warp under the oven heat. It’s a little heavy but I guess you need the gauge to make it sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike BK

customer_reviews.title: Solid but warps slightly during heating.
customer_reviews.text: Nice baking sheet. It does warp somewhat during use but returns to flat when cooled. The warping doesn’t appear to affect baking performance.
customer_reviews.author: Eric the Red

customer_reviews.title: Warps
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking it would not warp like my cheap pans, I was wrong. This warps just as bad.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Makes awesome crispy foods!
customer_reviews.text: These pans create a really nice crispiness underneath everything - it is so good with salmon! I've also made cookies and meringue cookies on a silpat and they've turned out great! The pans have been super easy to clean. However, I did notice some slight staining after I baked spring rolls and the cabbage dripped into the pan and burned. It's not really dark, but it's a light brown mark. I'm sure that would happen with any non-stick pan though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby LaFreniere

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They work so well in my oven, and everything I bake seems to be cooked/baked more evenly. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The best baking sheets I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! They are easy clean up and have not bent or warped. They bake well distributing the heat evenly throughout the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: warps
customer_reviews.text: This pan was supposed to be heavy duty. However, while roasting zucchini in a 375 degree oven, the pan warped. Very disappointing. On the plus side, the silicone coated surface is very non-stick and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: USA Pan Bakeware Half Sheet Pan, Set of 2, Aluminized Steel
product_meta.description: Style Name:Set of 2 Half Sheet PanThe USA Pan Half Sheet pan set of 2 is made in Pittsburgh, PA by a family owned and operated business. These baking pans provide home bakers with high quality and heavy duty tools to create memories and flawless homemade cookies, rolls or french-fries for friends and family. It is also perfect for roasting vegetables! The pans feature patented Americoat plus a silicone nonstick coating, which is PTFE, PFOA, and BPA free and promotes easy release for baked-goods and makes the pans easy to clean. USA Pan baking pans are uniquely designed with a fluted surface which facilitates air circulation and also maximizes pan strength and reduces warping. Every USA Pan is made in the USA and features a steel wire in the rim, which provides extra strength and further resistance to warping. The pans are built with performance features that commercial bakers enjoy, including heavy gauge Aluminized Steel constructed to allow even heat distribution and maximum service life. USA Pan is a Bundy family owned company, based in the greater Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania area which has been producing high performance bakeware for over 50 years.
feature_bullets: Classic half sheet pan set of 2 for baking, roasting, baon, cookies, vegetables, and cakes; commercial grade and heavy gauge aluminized steel
Baking pans feature unique design with corrugated surface; facilitates air circulation for a quick release and evenly baked baked-goods
Nonstick America coat coating - a patented silicone coating which is PTFE, PFOA and BPA free - provides easy release of baked-goods and easy clean up; wash with hot water, mild soap and gentle sponge
Baking surface Dimensions: 17. 25 x 12. 25 x 1 inches outer dimensions: 17. 75 x 12. 75 x 1 inches
USA Pan is a Bundy family company which has proudly manufactured high quality bakeware and provided jobs in the USA for over 50 years
